title: PM Office appoints digital media coordinators
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 19 (APP): Prime Minister Office (Public) appointed Dr. Talha Muhammad Younis Al Kashmiri as the Coordinator of Prime Minister for Arab Digital Media.
Waqas Mehmood was appointed as Coordinator of Prime Minister for Digital Media.
Prime Minister Office made both the appointments on an honorary basis and in this connection had issued the notifications.
